    		Communication Studies
    	Communication Studies offers a Bachelor of Arts in Communication Studies with options in Organizational Communication or Communication & Public Affairs in addition to a minor in Communication Studies. At the graduate level you can earn a Master of Arts in Communication Studies.Also housed in Communication Studies is the nationally recognized Speech and Debate Team, the communication honor society (Lambda Pi Eta), and the student organization—Students of Communication Studies Club (SOCS).Department Chair:David McCoy, Ph.DProgram Coordinator:Zach Justus, PhDAdministrative Support Coordinator:Peggy S.
